title: Sid Meier's Civilization IV
notes: Works fine any plays very smoothly until the world is centred after discovering calendar which causes the screen to go black.

title: Sid Meier's Civilization IV
notes: Two error messages keep popping up when the game tries to load its files.  Both are related to being unable to load XML files.  You need to install MS XML Core Services 3.0 (msxml3) through winetricks in order to solve the errors and make the game start properly.
I was able to play it for 20 minutes before it froze on me. Also, it doesn't seem to detect my Steam stats correctly (it called me "steamuser").
title: Sid Meier's Civilization® IV

notes: Ran perfectly out of the box.  Even the waiting for other civs icon is animated.

gpu: Intel Open Source Technology Center Mesa DRI Intel(R) Sandybridge Mobile x86/MMX/SSE2
